013package org.apache.juneau.svl.vars;
014
015import org.apache.juneau.svl.*;
016
017/**
018 * Upper-case variable resolver.
019 *
020 * <p>
021 * The format for this var is <js>"$NE{stringValue}"</js>.
022 *
023 * <p>
024 * This variable returns <js>"true"</js> if the contents are not empty.
025 *
026 * <p>
027 * Since this is a {@link SimpleVar}, any variables contained in the result will be recursively resolved.
028 * Likewise, if the arguments contain any variables, those will be resolved before they are passed to this var.
029 *
030 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
031 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/SimpleVariableLanguageBasics">Simple Variable Language</a>
032 * </ul>
033 */
034public class NotEmptyVar extends SimpleVar {
035
036   /** The name of this variable. */
037   public static final String NAME = "NE";
038
039   /**
040    * Constructor.
041    */
042   public NotEmptyVar() {
043      super(NAME);
044   }
045
046   @Override /* Parameter */
047   public String resolve(VarResolverSession session, String key) {
048      return String.valueOf(! key.trim().isEmpty());
049   }
050}
